brand_info.name: Clinique
brand_info.positioning: A dermatologist-developed beauty brand positioned at the intersection of clinical efficacy, safety, and simple routines, focused on healthy skin rather than decorative beauty.
brand_info.vision: To create great skin for everyone through safe, effective, dermatologist-guided skincare.
brand_info.mission: Deliver clinically tested, fragrance-free skincare and makeup solutions that support healthy skin across all types and concerns.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1968 in New York by Estée Lauder Companies in collaboration with dermatologist Dr. Norman Orentreich and editor Carol Phillips, Clinique pioneered the concept of dermatologist-developed, allergy-tested skincare.

brand_values.brand_promise: Provide safe, effective, and simple skincare solutions backed by dermatological science.
differentiators: Dermatologist-developed formulations tested for safety and tolerance.
Clear, system-based skincare routines such as the 3-Step Skin Care System.
Long-standing credibility within department store skincare.
non_negotiables: No fragrance and strict allergy-testing standards must be preserved.
Clinical credibility must remain central to all communication.
Claims must be evidence-based and compliant.
Avoid beauty hype disconnected from skin health.

psychographics.lifestyle: Consumers seeking reliable, dermatologist-backed skincare with minimal risk and clear routines.
psychographics.behavior: Routine-based skincare use, loyalty to trusted brands, preference for clear ingredient and benefit communication.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Educational, calm, and authoritative, translating dermatological science into accessible language.

logo.usage_rules: Use clean, high-contrast placement; avoid decorative effects or distortion.
logo.lockup_behavior: Wordmark used consistently; minimal co-branding unless required.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the 'C' in the wordmark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Minimal, clinical palette with restrained use of brand pastels; emphasis on cleanliness and clarity.

layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower third or end of layout

preferred_photographers: Beauty photographers with clean, editorial style
Studio photographers emphasizing texture and skin realism
Lifestyle photographers for subtle, everyday skin moments
style.camera_feel: Bright, clean imagery emphasizing real skin texture and health.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural expressions, relaxed confidence, minimal posing.
style.casting_attitude: Diverse skin tones, ages, and concerns represented authentically.

technical.lighting: Soft, even studio lighting minimizing harsh shadows.

model_casting.diversity: Broad and inclusive across skin types and tones

avoid: Heavy retouching that alters skin reality

visual_dos: Show real skin and real results

platform_behavior.Instagram: Skin education, product highlights, inclusive casting
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Educational skincare content and product updates

print.cover_rules: Minimal layouts with clear product and skin focus

logo_misuse_examples: Decorative treatments that undermine clinical tone
